original_text: And Benjamin returned at that time. And they gave them the women whom they had saved alive of the women of Jabesh-gilead, but they were not enough for them.
korean_text: 그 때에 베냐민이 돌아온지라 이에 이스라엘 사람이 야베스 길르앗 여자들 중에서 살려 둔 여자들을 그들에게 주었으나 아직도 부족하므로

sentences.original_text: And Benjamin returned at that time.
And they gave them the women
but they were not enough for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 수는 그들에게 충분하지 않았습니다.
